name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"43f4f717-dc29-48c5-8e1e-0d7aec041367","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Understanding ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_suffix","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"220819b7-cc68-487d-b71a-e50ea55312a7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_suffix","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a string manipulation utility designed to extract the difference between two strings by removing the shorter string from the longer one. It is particularly useful when you have a "base" string and a "modified" version and want to isolate the added characters.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"153d7e7a-14a6-496f-87f3-13123abf4bd4","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"07840631-f78f-4dbf-b5a0-090f14d16527","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How It Works","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"806afd44-fec3-4e10-ad60-98911355b257","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function follows a simple three-step logic:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b973db16-20e6-4875-9888-d799ef1d2924","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Length Check","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It compares the lengths of the two input strings (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"first","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"second","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c55aa4ab-524f-4520-9700-c2d5850ed5fe","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Swap (if necessary)","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": To ensure consistency, it reassigns the variables so that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"first","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is always the shorter string and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"second","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is always the longer string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"32416458-c31a-4f9e-8944-16861acd4130","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subtraction","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It uses the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".replace()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method to find occurrences of the shorter string within the longer string and replaces them with an empty string, effectively "chopping off" the shared part.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f0e360ee-f3fe-4b2d-9440-f13fb0bc770b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"4636048f-a27f-46f4-840b-196b3d82fb84","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Implementation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f5b3544-230f-49d6-97c8-8d2fc9eb2534","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"def get_suffix(first: str, second: str):
    """
    Returns the part of the longer string that does not contain 
    the shorter string.
    """
    if len(first) > len(second):
        first, second = second, first
    return second.replace(first, '')","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7eaab585-8255-44f1-9028-80b41e26b7fb","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"10a0baa1-cfd2-4c7d-b860-ddc3d7149af3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why Use It?","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2d6ed1fc-2924-42b6-a696-f18ef529116b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dynamic Input Handling","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": You don't need to know which string is longer before passing them to the function; the internal swap handles it for you.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2667df89-a4d7-4119-b8bf-5308634ad3d9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Path or Label Extraction","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It is helpful for identifying file extensions, subdirectories, or naming conventions where a prefix is shared.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9770db28-2a3d-4055-b0b7-7af4de5aae00","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clean Syntax","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It abstracts the conditional logic required to prevent errors when trying to find a "suffix" from strings of unknown lengths.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3efdaa6-26b0-49b0-9dec-3fc958ad8470","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ddbb2e5c-be84-4292-942c-789122c5ee70","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Practical Examples","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fb94e13f-cc4d-482a-b462-d53f2e40a166","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. Basic Suffix Extraction","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c4cab049-a1f2-43af-9c7e-3d446cc8a153","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If you have a base name and a versioned name, you can extract the versioning info.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3d920a8-61a4-4b15-964c-71780e4e1d1b","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"base = "report"
full = "report_v2_final"

suffix = get_suffix(base, full)
print(suffix)  # Output: "_v2_final"","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"58c87375-f0fc-4542-82c3-b1dd56df3406","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Handling Swapped Arguments","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b12c33a-b3a9-4a52-86b4-a0e12d39e5fb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function is robust and handles inputs regardless of the order they are provided.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4e4085a8-4c83-4f0c-a502-b33e7662724e","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"print(get_suffix("data_archive", "data")) 
# Output: "_archive" (Even though the longer string was first)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"709aba83-6b30-4fd5-99cf-cd32a5692667","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Path Processing","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f07b2c8a-eed9-4d27-bf34-23797d042457","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Extracting a subfolder or filename from a known root directory.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1e1ede0e-4f6a-4d88-842b-198e7f70588f","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"root = "/usr/local/bin/"
full_path = "/usr/local/bin/python3"

cmd = get_suffix(root, full_path)
print(cmd)  # Output: "python3"","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6137bf39-4359-47ba-bb94-1fd2815b9d3e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Important Considerations","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a6f5b96d-b72e-4c03-b120-0c0fd50376bb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Multiple Occurrences","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Because it uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".replace(first, '')","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", if the shorter string appears multiple times in the longer string, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"all","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" occurrences will be removed.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"c7e1db56-d6d3-4baa-929b-a5a0ed51739f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_suffix("abc", "abc_test_abc")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" would return ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""_test_"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"e4d431d5-5c0a-4817-bbec-95f1b65b2b1e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Case Sensitivity","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This function is case-sensitive. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_suffix("base", "BASE_extra")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" will return ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""BASE_extra"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" because ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""base"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (lowercase) is not found within the uppercase string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d5df13d0-f41b-40cb-a61f-6f3bb72c3d98","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
